title: Training Dummies
description: 4 High quality training dummies that make your game look awesome
longDescription:
Medieval environments are everywhere. It is just a theme that is so appealing, and you know that because you are making an awesome medieval scene, right?


This dummies will help you to decorate your scene and have the must have feature that every game has: the training room.


If you are looking for a training room, perhaps you are using a sword to hit your targets, or a bow or maybe you need the player to practice some martial arts? Then this is what every game has, a simple but very useful models that can help you create that awesome mechanic you have in your mind right now.


This pack contains 4 high quality training dummies with realistic materials. They also come with an arrow in case you need it. They come with collisions, LODs and fully modular materials to create several variations. It will save you several working hours and help you to achieve what is most important to you: your awesome game.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Five 3D Models
  • Modular materials for both Mobile and High end platforms

Texture Sizes:

  •  2048 px for the dummies
  •  1024 px for the arrow

Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes

Collision: Yes, automatically generated

Vertex Count:

Training Dummy A: [LOD0 = 3931] [LOD1 = 3120] [LOD2 = 2305] [LOD3 = 1367] [LOD4 = 781]

Training Dummy B: [LOD0 = 2650] [LOD1 = 2059] [LOD2 = 1453] [LOD3 = 804] [LOD4 = 459]

Training Dummy C: [LOD0 = 3161] [LOD1 = 2512] [LOD2 = 1774] [LOD3 = 987] [LOD4 = 552]

Archery Dummy: [LOD0 = 692] [LOD1 = 564] [LOD2 = 439] [LOD3 = 304] [LOD4 = 206]

Arrow: [LOD0 = 869] [LOD1 = 718] [LOD2 = 508] [LOD3 = 308] [LOD4 = 194]

LODs: Yes, 5 LODs for each mesh

Number of Meshes: 5

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 5 Materials, 8 Material Instances, 1 Material Function

Number of Textures: 16

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, Console, Mobile, VR

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, Console, Mobile, VR

Documentation: No

Important/Additional Notes: If you have any questions, don't hesitate to comment below! More more updates, you can stay up to date in UE4 forums
